meta.title: About | OpenEconomy - Built for People, Not Profit
meta.description: Learn about OpenEconomy's mission, principles, and team. We're building fair exchange infrastructure for everyone, with no profit motive and complete transparency.

hero.headline: Built for people, not profit
hero.subheadline: OpenEconomy exists because millions deserve access to fair exchange. Here's why we built it and what we believe.

sections.statement: To create economic infrastructure where everyone can participate in fair exchange, regardless of access to traditional financial systems.

problem.title: The Problem We Saw
points: Stay-at-home parents whose labor isn't valued
Artists and creatives between paid gigs
Retirees with decades of skills and no platform
Students with time but no money
problem.conclusion: Their skills have real value. The system just doesn't recognize it.

solution.title: Our Answer
solution.description: OpenEconomy makes invisible value visible. Instead of money, we use time-value normalization: your skills exchanged at fair rates, person to person.

items.title: Fair by Design
items.description: Every system choice prioritizes fairness. No features that advantage the wealthy or connected.

items.title: Radically Inclusive
items.description: If someone is excluded, we've failed. No bank accounts, resumes, or credentials required.

items.title: Transparent Always
items.description: Open source code. Public finances. Visible reputation. No hidden algorithms.

items.title: Community Governed
items.description: The community decides the future. Not founders, not investors, not corporations.

items.title: Privacy Respected
items.description: Share what you choose. Your data is yours. We don't sell, mine, or exploit information.

items.title: Non-Extractive
items.description: No fees on exchanges. No platform take rate. 100% of value goes to participants.

header.headline: Who's Building This
header.subheadline: OpenEconomy doesn't have employees. We have contributors.
